author: zalo#5389
install_msg: Congratulations!  Users can now make threads by adding the :thread: emoji to messages! Use [p]threadweaver-settings to view configuration.
name: Threadweaver
short: A Discord Redbot Cog that adds threading functionality via the :thread: reaction.
description: A Discord Redbot Cog that allows users to react to messages with the :thread: emoji to create temporary channels based around that comment.
